name: Eye will see you down there
name_original: Eye will see you down there
description:
"Eye will see you down there" is an endless runner where you play as a pair of eyes, trying to get as deep as possible whilst avoiding enemy eyes, trying to catch you while moving in various patterns.

Use arrow keys to move (you cannot move up). Moving down costs stamina, which recharges over time (indicated by a bar in the top right corner). There will sometimes be 3D Glasses which let you teleport to another pair of glasses.

Everything was made by @vegmuffin over the weekend.  

Tools:

- Unity for the game engine;

- piskelapp for some of the art;

- Bfxr for some sound effects.
